titleInfo.title: 'An Arab café in Bagdad.' Photographer: Wilfrid Malleson

physicalDescription.extent: Dimensions:105 x 144 mmCondition:The print is in good condition with minor surface dirt throughout.Foliation:‘40’

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject MatterCafé scene in Baghdad. Seven or more men sit on benches in the shade on the café terrace.InscriptionsInk, below image: 'An Arab café in Bagdad.'Pencil, at left, above image: ‘40’; ‘18’
